Sika Koné (KOH-nay) (amụrụ na Julaị 13, na afọ 2002) bụ onye Mali na-agba bọọlụ basketball onye bụ onye nweere onwe ya ugbu a
Na ụkwụ isii na atọ, Koné bụ onye na-agba ọsọ nke gbara bọọlụ maka Gran Canaria na Spain na 2022. Ọ bụ New York Liberty nke Women's National Basketball Association (WNBA) dere ya na agba nke atọ.
New York Liberty họọrọ Koné na No
29 n'ozuzu na agba nke atọ nke 2022 WNBA draft.
